column4: can any one help me : my ntfs drives of windows and data drive are not being displayed in ubuntu
why are my other partitions of my drive not being displayed ,they are in ntfs format
you need to install a package for this: ntfs-config. Install this by (sudo apt-get install ntfs-config) and then run it (sudo ntfs-config OR menu): enable read and write support
by checking the checkboxes for this in the ntfs-config dialog
